jobref.args: -domain-name snapzilla.local -data-vip-name DEMO -controller-vip-name DEMO -vm-role 1 -datastore_2 /DC/datastore/ds4_2TB_SSD -vnic-0-ip 10.0.0.121 -datastore_3 /DC/datastore/ds4_2TB_SSD -ntp-server pool.ntp.org -vnic-0-gateway 10.0.0.138 -ovf-extra-config default -ovf-extra-config-options default,default -ovf-options --acceptAllEulas,--skipManifestCheck,--noSSLVerify,--overwrite,--powerOffTarget,--powerOn,--X:injectOvfEnv -disk-mode thin -vnic-0-ip_3 10.0.0.123 -vnic-1-network /DC/network/VM Network -vnic-0-ip_2 10.0.0.122 -deployment-size-mem 49152 -dns-server 10.0.0.138,8.8.8.8 -disclaimer Authorised access only -vmware-esx-host_3 /DC/host/CLUS-01/10.0.0.111 -node-type Hybrid -deployment-size-cpu 8 -vnic-0-mask 255.255.255.0 -data-vip DEMO -controller-vip DEMO -deployment-size large -vmware-esx-host_2 /DC/host/CLUS-01/10.0.0.111 -vmware-esx-host_1 /DC/host/CLUS-01/10.0.0.111 -backup-percentage 50 -vnic-0-static static -datastore-1 /DC/datastore/ds4_2TB_SSD -deployment-option 1intv4 -Option Execute -host-name_3 cw03 -vnic-options vNIC0,vNIC1 -host-name_1 cw01 -host-name_2 cw02 -cw-version CNC4-EFT-4
jobref.name: CNC - 3 Node Cluster (single vNIC)
